xmlkeyword.term: Eiffel Editor, Fonts and Colors Options

paragraph.paragraph: The Fonts and Colors option page in the Environment folder in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxoriOptions.htmOptions Dialog Box (Tools, Options menu) contains the following options:

The ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/dexplore/html/dxurffontscolorsenvironmentoptionsdialogbox.htmFonts and Colors options, in the ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxorienvironment.htmEnvironment configuration group, is not specific to EiffelEnvision's ../index.xmlEiffel Editor; the editor merely extends the Display Items list with a series of configurable editor fonts and colors. All ../index.xmlEiffel Editor specific items are easy to locate as each is prefixed with the word Eiffel. Each item relates to how the editor renders syntax highlighting and other such colorization.

Many of the non-specific Display Items (those not bound to an add-in or another language) are used within the ../index.xmlEiffel Editor also. For their descriptions and usage, please refer to the Visual Studio .NET ms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/dexplore/html/dxurffontscolorsenvironmentoptionsdialogbox.htmFonts and Colors Options documentation.
The ../index.xmlEiffel Editor defines the following Display Items for customization:

Eiffel Character:
Eiffel single characters, the character between matching single quotation marks (').

Eiffel Class:
Eiffel ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclass declarations, in the upper-case form EIFFEL_CLASS_NAME.

Eiffel Comment:
The comments declared by prefixing a section of text on a single line with double-hyphens (--).

Eiffel Identifier:
All Eiffel ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature names, local variables and ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature argument names within the body of a ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlfeature's code.

Eiffel Keyword:
Eiffel syntax construct keywords.

Eiffel Number:
Numerical constants declared with an Eiffel ../../../../../technologies/dotnet/eiffel_dotnet_language/10_conventions/10_terminology.xmlclass.

Eiffel Reserved Word:
Eiffel reserved words, such as Result, Current and Void.

Eiffel String:
Eiffel manifest strings, located between double-quotation marks (") or multi-lined verbatim string located between "[ and ]".

Eiffel Symbol:
Eiffel symbolic characters such as parentheses (), braces {}, brackets [], operators (+, -, *, :=, ...), etc.
